name: Dr. Sarah Tailor
description: Dr. John Melborn received his Doctorate in Medical Dentistry from Hospital USA in 2003. Following his professional qualification he practiced maxillofacial surgery at Hospital and the Royal Hospital. Dr. Bigham gained membership of the College of Surgeons of USA in 2007. He has over 10 years of experience working general dental practitioner in both Surrey and central.
